name: Apple Tree
basic_care: Apple trees need full sun and well-drained soil. They benefit from annual pruning to maintain shape and improve air circulation.
watering_instructions: Water deeply every 7-10 days during dry periods, especially in the first few years of establishment.

name: Lemon Tree
basic_care: Lemon trees prefer full sun and slightly acidic, well-drained soil. They are sensitive to cold and need protection from frost.
watering_instructions: Water weekly during the growing season and reduce frequency in winter. Allow soil to dry out slightly between waterings.

name: Olive Tree
basic_care: Olive trees thrive in full sun and well-drained soil. They are drought-tolerant and prefer dry climates.
watering_instructions: Water young trees weekly. Mature trees require less frequent watering, every 2-4 weeks during dry periods.

name: Fig Tree
basic_care: Fig trees need full sun and fertile, well-drained soil. They can tolerate drought once established.
watering_instructions: Water deeply every 1-2 weeks during the growing season. Reduce watering in fall and winter.

name: Maple Tree
basic_care: Maple trees grow best in full sun to partial shade and moist, well-drained soil. Mulch to maintain soil moisture and reduce weeds.
watering_instructions: Water young trees weekly. Mature trees typically need water during prolonged dry spells only.

name: Peach Tree
basic_care: Peach trees require full sun and well-drained soil. Annual pruning helps maintain shape and boost fruit production.
watering_instructions: Water deeply once a week during the growing season, especially while fruits are developing.

name: Cherry Tree
basic_care: Cherry trees need full sun and well-drained, slightly acidic soil. They benefit from spring pruning.
watering_instructions: Water deeply every 7-10 days during dry spells, especially in early years.

name: Avocado Tree
basic_care: Avocado trees grow best in full sun and rich, well-drained soil. Protect from frost and wind.
watering_instructions: Water 2-3 times a week during the first year. Mature trees need deep watering every 1-2 weeks.

name: Pomegranate Tree
basic_care: Pomegranates prefer full sun and tolerate a range of soils. They are drought-tolerant once established.
watering_instructions: Water deeply every 7-10 days during fruit development. Reduce watering after harvest.

name: Plum Tree
basic_care: Plum trees need full sun and well-drained soil. Annual pruning helps maintain health and fruit yield.
watering_instructions: Water weekly during dry spells, especially while fruit is forming.

name: Walnut Tree
basic_care: Walnut trees need full sun and deep, fertile soil. They require plenty of space and benefit from mulching.
watering_instructions: Water young trees weekly. Mature trees should be watered deeply during dry periods.

name: Hazelnut Tree
basic_care: Hazelnut trees prefer full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. They benefit from regular pruning to shape the canopy.
watering_instructions: Water consistently during dry spells, especially in the first few years.

name: Dogwood Tree
basic_care: Dogwood trees thrive in partial shade and moist, well-drained soil. Mulch to keep roots cool and moist.
watering_instructions: Water regularly during dry weather, especially when young.

name: Redbud Tree
basic_care: Redbuds prefer full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. They benefit from pruning after flowering.
watering_instructions: Water regularly during dry periods, particularly in the first few years.

name: Magnolia Tree
basic_care: Magnolias need full sun to partial shade and rich, well-drained soil. Protect from strong winds.
watering_instructions: Water deeply once or twice a week, especially during hot, dry weather.

name: Cedar Tree
basic_care: Cedar trees prefer full sun and well-drained soil. They are drought-tolerant once established.
watering_instructions: Water young trees weekly during dry periods. Mature trees typically need less frequent watering.

name: Pine Tree
basic_care: Pine trees thrive in full sun and sandy, well-drained soil. Minimal pruning is needed.
watering_instructions: Water deeply every 2-3 weeks during dry weather. Young trees require more frequent watering.
